title.rendered: Tamil Nadu Premier League 2021 Salem Spartans matches report, history and records

content.rendered:
The sixth edition of Tamil Nadu Premier League also known as TNPL-6 is not yet but set to start from this 23rd June, 2022. A total of 8 teams are going to participate and will have 28 league games with 4 playoffs. The final match round is planned for July 31st in Coimbatore.

But before the league comes into action, let’s take a quick recap from 2021, especially with regards to the team that is the strong contender for the upcoming tournament, 2022. The name of the team we are talking about here is Salem Spartans, formerly known as Tuti Patriots. Recently, the franchise, Salem Spartan, has chosen Taj777 digital news and update app by announcing it as its official ‘Associate Sponsor’.

Tamil Nadu Premier League 2021- Salem Spartans History 2021

  • Franchise Name – Salem Spartans
  • Owner – Vivo South Chennai distributor
  • Team Anthem Song – Vanakkam Da Mapla

Tamil Nadu Premier League 2021 – Salem Spartans Match Report 2021

Salem Spartans in Tamil Nadu Premier League 2021 was the first team to against Lyca Kovai Kings in the opening match conducted on July 19th but the match got disrupted due to rain and was abandoned without result.

  • Player of the Match – None
  • Stadium/Venue

The second match that Salem Spartans played against IDream Tiruppur Tamizhans on July 24th, 2021, which they (Salem Spartans) won by 16 runs.

  • Player of the match – Darryl Ferrario
  • Stadium/Venue – M. A. Chidambaram Stadium

The third match the team Salem Spartans played against was Chepauk Super Gillies on July 28th, 2021. The match this time was won by Chepauk Super Gillies by 4 wickets

  • Player of the match – Narayan Jagadeesan
  • Stadium/Venue – M. A. Chidambaram Stadium

The fourth match the team Salem Spartans played against was Dindigul Dragons on July 30th, 2021, which the Dindigul Dragons won by 76 runs.

  • Player of the match – Vivek R
  • Stadium/Venue – M. A. Chidambaram Stadium

The fifth match the team Salem Spartans played against was Ruby Trichy Warriors on August 1st, 2021 but was won by 6 wickets Ruby Trichy Warriors

  • Player of the match – Rahil Shah
  • Stadium/Venue – M. A. Chidambaram Stadium

The sixth matchthe team the team Salem Spartans played against was Nellai Royal Kings on August 5th, 2021 but was won 8 wickets by Nellai Royal Kings

  • Player of the match – Sanjay Yadhav
  • Stadium/Venue – M. A. Chidambaram Stadium

The seventh match the team Salem Spartans played against was Siechem Madurai Panthers on August 7th, 2021 and was won by 11 runs by Salem Spartans

  • Player of the match – Vijay Shankar
  • Stadium/Venue – M. A. Chidambaram Stadium

Tamil Nadu Premier League 2021 – Salem Spartans 2021 Records

  • In the TNPL 2021, the most runs were scored by Vijay Shankar (160 runs)
  • In the TNPL 2021, the most wickets taken by Ganeshan Periyaswamy (11 wickets)
  • In the TNPL 2021, the most number wicket keeping dismissals was made by Umashankar Sushil 4 dismissals

Read more: Taj777 News is the associate sponsor of Salem Spartans in TNPL 2022
